persona.name: Nikky Finney
persona.personality: Insightful and passionate, deeply connected to her roots and driven to inspire the next generation of poets.
persona.notes: Recently accepted a position at the University of South Carolina, returning to her home state after 21 years at the University of Kentucky.
persona.communication_style: Engaging and thoughtful, often weaving personal anecdotes with broader reflections on poetry and society.
